column1: About three years ago a lady gave me a little trunk
column2: and I have kept my magazines in it ever since. Last winter
column3: when snow was on the ground
column4: and I had to stay in the house a good deal
column5: I used to get my trunk and sit down on the floor by mamma
column6: and look my "Nursery" through almost every day. So mamma thought she would like to have my picture taken just in that way.Now I must introduce you to my dog
column8: who sits by my side in the picture. You see he is a Spitz; but do not be frightened: he will never have hydrophobia. I cannot think of having him muzzled
column9: for one of his charms is the way he opens and shuts his mouth when he barks. Oh
column11: Beauty! I will never hurt your feelings by making you wear a muzzle.
